mapper.select: SELECT id FROM sys_menu_info WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} LIMIT 1

SELECT id, path, `name`, component, redirect, title, link AS isLink, keep_alive AS isKeepAlive, affix AS isAffix, iframe AS isIframe, element_icon AS icon, type FROM sys_menu_info WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY order_num ASC

SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.path, c.name, c.component, c.redirect, c.title, c.link AS isLink, c.keep_alive AS isKeepAlive, c.affix AS isAffix, c.iframe AS isIframe, c.element_icon AS icon, FROM sys_role_user a INNER JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu_info c ON b.menu_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND c.visible = '1' AND c.parent_id = #{parentId} AND c.client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY orderNum ASC

SELECT DISTINCT c.code FROM sys_role_user a INNER JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id INNER JOIN sys_element_info c ON b.menu_id = c.id INNER JOIN sys_menu_info d ON c.menu_id = d.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND c.visible = '1' AND d.visible = '1' AND d.client_id = #{clientId}
